title: Wild mushroom risotto with sautéed Jerusalem artichokes
description: Mushroom risotto gets an upgrade with golden chanterelle mushrooms, earthy Jerusalem artichokes and a crunchy Parmesan crisp. Divine. Equipment: You will need a circular cutter.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz unsalted butter, plus extra knob for stirring in
salt and freshly ground black pepper
extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling
